title: Mirror of Germany. No. 172 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Peace movements
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Peace movements
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Olympic Games (20th : 1972 : Munich, Germany)
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Russian freighter runs aground in the Elbe estuary; a plea for world-wide peace and freedom by the Federal President, Heinrich Lubke; award of prizes for painting to children between 5 and 16 on the theme of the coming Olympic Games at Munich; the Bavarian Woods; electronic computers put to use by the German Postal Cheque offices; a topical art exhibition by 20 young artists; a documentary display of musical boxes, gramophone records, radios at the Hannover History Museum; Germany's best drivers meet in Cologne.
